Detailed Description

template<typename T, typename Compare = std::less<T>, typename idx = unsigned int>
class kche_tree::KHeap< T, Compare, idx >

Define a reference-based heap that holds the K best elements on it allowing to push them in logarithmic time.

Note:
Even if asyntotically optimal it could be slower than k-vectors for small values of K due to extra operations and cache misses.
Template Parameters:
TType of the data stored in the k-heap.
CompareType of the comparison object. The class must inherit from std::binary_function an define its bool (const &T, const &T) const operator.
idxType used for encoding data vector indices. Defaults to unsigned int, but can be reduced to short or char for small K values.
